name: shroomate
description: Mushroom picker's assitant and social media
author: Jaka Krivic <jaka.krivic@gmail.com>

scripts.import:db-docker: cd data; node ./db_import.js; docker cp ./gobesi.json web-dev-mongo-db:/gobesi.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db shroomate --collection Species --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file gobesi.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db rm -rf gobesi.json; rm ./gobesi.json
scripts.transfer:db-docker-atlas: docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "mongodump -h localhost -d shroomate -o ./"; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "mongorestore --drop --uri mongodb+srv://app@shroomate.bcxlfpk.mongodb.net/shroomate ./shroomate/Species.bson"; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "rm -rf ./shroomate"
